title: C-Payment
description: A modern cryptocurrency payment gateway platform featuring both user-facing interfaces and a comprehensive admin dashboard. Enables businesses to accept, process, and manage crypto payments with support for 300+ cryptocurrencies, real-time analytics, and secure transaction handling.

title: Physio
description: A comprehensive physiotherapy patient management system with exercise program tracking, progress monitoring, and admin dashboard. Features frontend-only mode for development with mock data and full backend integration support. (Demo: Sign in with any email/password)

title: Uranus
description: Uranus is fully responsive website. Main theme of this portfolio website of a company.

title: Nava
description: Nava is fully responsive website. Main theme of this website is renting, buying and selling of boat.
